forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning fog, then cloudy this afternoon. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low 7C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low near 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will become overcast in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy late. Low 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 49F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 13C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 46F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High around 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low around 45F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 13C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Plentiful sunshine. High 13C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High near 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds overnight. Low 42F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 55F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.
